data.contentText: --! This is an HIV exposed baby ! --

metadata.text1: If there are any risk factors for sepsis give antibiotics
metadata.title1: Confirm the baby is definitely having daily NVP

metadata.text1:
Check if the mother/guardian has Nevirapine

Teach the mother/guardian how & when to administer NVP

Tell them to always report to a member of staff when they have administered the medication to the baby for recording, until the baby is discharged

If the mother/guardian are unable to administer NVP ensure the nursing staff are aware and able to give NVP
metadata.title1: Please make sure the baby is definitely receiving daily Nevirapine (NVP)
metadata.text2: If there are any risk factors for sepsis give antibiotics

data.title: MANAGEMENT
